original_query: After sunset every day, turn on the living room lights for 5 minutes, then turn on the Office WLED, wait 30 seconds, and turn off the living room lights

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living, living_room, office
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

message: I found some ambiguities in your request. I detected these locations: living_room, office. Please answer 2 question(s) to help me create the automation accurately.
